# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdnhub-driver-zte-sptn-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdnhub/driver-zte-sptn/standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/standalone-1.1.0-20170127.061743-1-linux64.tar.gz" && tar -xf sdnhub-driver-zte-sptn-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f sdnhub-driver-zte-sptn-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8640
RUN echo Open-O sdnhub-driver-zte-sptn 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdnhub/driver-zte-sptn/standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/standalone-1.1.0-20170127.061743-1-linux64.tar.gz" > OPENO_VERSION
